summary: In the jungle near Angkor Wat in Cambodia, Mr. Moto poses as an ineffectual archaeologist and a venerable holy man with mystical powers to help foil two insurgencies against the government.
cast: Peter Lorre|Rochelle Hudson|Robert Kent|J. Edward Bromberg|Chick Chandler|George Regas|Frederick Vogeding|H.W. Gim|Al Kikume|James B. Leong|Gloria Roy|Victor Sen Yung
keywords: serial murder|psychotronic film|man wears eyeglasses|mr. moto character|village
title: Mr. Moto Takes a Chance
